item.title: Getting started with encryption of documents
item.description:
I work - broadly speaking - in epidemiology. In collaborations I often have to send (sensitive) data or wait for it to arrive on my computer.

To simplify life for both parties I have written some instructions:

  • Here are the instructions for the sender of the document.
  • Here are the instructions that the recipient needs to follow.
